name: John POULLARD, petitioner, v. M. PITMAN, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
John POULLARD, petitioner,
v.
M. PITMAN, et al.

opinions.text: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeal of Louisiana, Second Circuit, dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

casebody.head_matter:
John POULLARD, petitioner,
v.
M. PITMAN, et al.
No. 14-6335.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 1, 2014.
Opinion
